thread.title: Pregnant Beyonce goes NAKED for an underwater photoshoot – view pics
thread.title_full: Pregnant Beyonce goes NAKED for an underwater photoshoot – view pics

author: Aarti Iyengar
title: Pregnant Beyonce goes NAKED for an underwater photoshoot – view pics
text:
Pregnant Beyonce goes NAKED… Pregnant Beyonce goes NAKED for an underwater photoshoot – view pics More pics of Beyonce flaunting her baby bump in a naked photoshoot have surfaced - check it out. By Aarti Iyengar | Published: February 2, 2017 8:49 pm Beyonce, Blake Lively, Kim Kardashian: Hollywood Celebrities Who Flaunted Baby Bump In Style 
Beyonce recently took to Instagram to announce that she is pregnant with twins. For this, the pop diva actually did a lovely photoshoot in a bikini and shared a pic from the shoot to make the announcement. However, looks like there are more pics from the photoshoot that we didn’t know about, until now! Yes, turns out the bikini clad is just one pic out of the many that were shot! A series of pictures from the photoshoot have surfaced on the internet and it just gets sexier. You can find all of them on her website as well. The theme of the shoot hasn’t just been flowery and botany garden like but it also has some under water shiz going on. Can you believe that? Basically, a proper day has been spent to click some of the sexiest photoshoot for the pregnant pop diva. We’ve managed to get our hands on the pics which we think are super raunchy. We think its super cool that Beyonce has done a lovely shoot to document her pregnancy. In case you folks didn’t know, she’s expecting twins. 
Beyonce and Jay Z are already parents to 5-year-old Blue Ivy. They are super excited to welcome the twins. Gotta admit, this is by far the coolest announcement done by any celebrity about their pregnancy. The shoot done the Single Ladies hitmaker not only has some lovely floral sequences but is also shot under water. Ain’t that cool? Plus, the photoshoot also features her unborn babies and her 5-year-old daughter. There are some really dreamy pictures which are totally laudable. We can go on and on about it but let’s stop now. Scroll below and check out the pics. ( ALSO READ – After Lisa Haydon, Beyonce announces her pregnancy on Instagram – view pic ) 
Beyonce and Blue Ivy – 
Could she be more beautiful? 
The pop diva giving us dreamy poses – 
There’s a throne of roses for the pretty woman – 
Another sizzling pic from her photoshoot – 
An underwater shot, gorgeous isn’t it? 
You should check out the video of this as well – Feb 2, 2017 at 4:06am PST 
A close up of Blue Ivy – 
What an ‘aww’-worthy moment – 
Goddess, we bow down! 
The last pic from this photoshoot – 
Although lately even Bollywood has started adapting to making it public about pregnancy, perhaps a naked photoshoot might still take some time. In the recent past, we have so many examples of how B-town divas have opened up about their pregnancy and haven’t shied away from the eyes of paparazzi. Take Lisa Haydon and Shveta Salve for example. They used social media and flaunted their baby bump as they announced that they were expecting. Even Kareena Kapoor Khan has done several photoshoots before Taimur Ali Khan was born. She actually became a revolution as she was the first actress to have stepped out so often and done chat shows, attended red carpet, done an ad shoot and even featured on several magazines! 
Anyway, what are your thoughts on Beyonce’s steamy pregnancy photoshoot? Tell us in the comments box below. Stay tuned to this space for hot scoop and latest updates.
